p: Main drivers of high in-hospital mortality rate in our cohort are age, disease severity at admission and weight of comorbidities, as represented by Charlson index, as well as inflammatory and pro-coagulatory markers, as shown by others ( Ciceri et al., 2020, Wu et al., 2020, Zhou et al., 2020). We did not find an association between individual comorbidities and risk of death, differently from other reports ( Ciceri et al., 2020, Cummings et al., 2020).
